The document scanning position sensor detected that the document length was 40 cm or more while scanning a document.

<User Check> • Set the document length within the standard. 1 Document scanning position actuator caught in sections of the machine Reattach the document scanning position actuator. 2 Document scanning position sensor failure Replace the document scanning position sensor PCB ASSY. 3 Main PCB failure Replace the main PCB ASSY.
Document Jam/too Long See Troubleeshooting in Use`s Guide.
The document scanning position sensor has not detected the top of the document even after the document has been fed for the specified distance.

<User Check> • Set the document in the ADF correctly. 1 Document scanning position actuator coming off Reattach the document scanning position actuator. 2 Document scanning position sensor failure Replace the document scanning position sensor PCB ASSY. 3 Main PCB failure Replace the main PCB ASSY.
Cover is Open Close the front cover.
